attributes.action: We demand an immediate General Election
attributes.additional_details: The appointment of Boris Johnson into any position in the cabinet should be evidence enough of questionable judgment, after he has demonstrated that he is capable of bending the truth to his own ends and quits as soon as the going gets tough.  Please let us have the opportunity to decide whether we want this to go any further before it is too late
attributes.background: Theresa May is our recently appointed PM, but is unelected by the British public.  She has immediately demonstrated questionable judgment by appointing Boris Johnson as Foreign Secretary.  We demand an immediate general election to allow the public to decide whether or not she should remain in power
